summary:
I am a responsible adult so I'm taking off work tomorrow to focus on the important things in life, skam france 3x09. 
I wanna...
body:
I am a responsible adult so I’m taking off work tomorrow to focus on the important things in life, skam france 3x09.

I wanna rewatch the whole season first but I did the math and I think I need to start at 9:30am my time to finish before the episode airs. Should I watch a few tonight or should I seriously devote my whole day tomorrow to it?

summary: Bless Lucas, he’s still hopeful about him and Eliott, but at the same time he’s not, he’s very nervous, worried and confused, he...
question: Bless Lucas, he’s still hopeful about him and Eliott, but at the same time he’s not, he’s very nervous, worried and confused, he has no idea what to do to. He just wants and needs to hear from Eliott again. He needs to know how Eliott feels but he can’t get through to him. It must be agonising for him to have this wall of silence since the weekend when he told Eliott he can’t deal with it all right now. He must regret it but he didn’t realise. Now he’s thinking he’s driven Eliott away.
answer: I’mma count to ten, and if this ask is still here, I am sueing

reblog.comment: I’mma count to ten, and if this ask is still here, I am sueing

trail.content_raw: I’mma count to ten, and if this ask is still here, I am sueing
